summary: Adds extra fur boots to the game. These have the same stats of regular fur boots with some difference in looks and money value based on pelt types.
descriptionHtml:
Adds extra fur boots to the game. These have the same stats of \"vanilla\" fur boots with some difference in looks and money value based on pelt types.

Details:
- 5 pairs of fur boots (generic, sabre cat, snow sabre cat, bear, cave bear).
- New mesh & textures.
- Doesn\'t replace anything and shouldn\'t conflict with other mods, ie no existing records are modified only new ones are added.
- Art assets are in a .bsa package for convenience.
- Optional crafting with specific animal pelts at a tanning rack (4 types).
- Optional crafting with cleaned pelts and hide lace with \'Frostfall\' mod (1 type).
- Crafted using pelts (the pelt type determines the color).
- Crafting data is in 2 separate optional esps.
- Won\'t be found in any containers or on NPCs. Can only be crafted by using the included plugins or added through the console (use \'help \"Fur Boots\"\' to get the ids).
- All boots are called \"Fur Boots\".
- Boots material is hide.
author: thecaptainhere

files.name: ExtraFurBoots_02
files.changelogHtml: Fixed up the mesh a bit.
